tree.name: Cedric Coward
tree.tradeDescription: Memphis traded Yang Hansen (16th pick), 2027 2nd (ATL own), 2028 1st (ORL own), and 2028 2nd (SAC own) to Portland for Cedric Coward
tree.note: Eastern Washington forward, acquired from Portland on draft night
